QuestData.Title: The Seed of Doubt
QuestData.Description: The problem with the sha of doubt, $r, is its deceitful pervasiveness.$B$BOnce the seed of doubt is planted, it can grow like an unwelcome weed.$B$BSuch a seed has been planted in The Widow's Wail to the north, and like a weed, we must extinguish its presence immediately.$B$BI need you to destroy the lingering fragment of doubt before it can infect any more victims.
